Metadata.title: Dynamic Gospel Church | Home Away From Home
Metadata.description: Dynamic Gospel Church (NY) and Dynamic Gospel Church (CA) - a warm spiritual home for Chinese and East Asian communities in the U.S.

Hero.title: Home Away From Home
Hero.subtitle: Finding Your Spiritual Home Away From Home
Hero.body: Whether you just arrived or have lived here for years, Dynamic Gospel Church is your harbor. We walk with you in Queens, New York and Irvine, California.
Hero.imageAlt: Congregation worshiping in a modern church

Livestream.title: Live Worship Service
Livestream.subtitle: Online Livestream
Livestream.description: Wherever you are, join us online to worship, pray, and learn God's word together.
Livestream.time: Sunday worship: New York 10:00 AM | Irvine 11:00 AM (Pacific)

About.title: Not Just a Church, But a Family
About.subtitle: A place to belong, grow, and be cared for

paragraphs.one: Dynamic Gospel Church (New York) and Dynamic Gospel Church (California) are devoted to serving Chinese and East Asian communities in the U.S. We understand the bittersweet journey of immigration—from language barriers to cultural shock, from identity anxiety to everyday pressure.
paragraphs.two: Here, we share not only the truth of the Gospel, but also the burdens of life. We are a community of passionate immigrants, and our elders and co-workers have walked the same road you are on. We gather to support one another and warm every wandering soul with the love of Christ.

About.quote: Here, we are a group of passionate immigrants, and our elders and co-workers have lived what you are living.

Elder.name: Elder Peiming Tian
Elder.role: Dynamic Gospel Church (New York) | Dynamic Gospel Church (Irvine)

paragraphs.intro: Elder Peiming Tian serves at Dynamic Gospel Church (New York) and supports Dynamic Gospel Church (California) through the Irvine home fellowship and new immigrant welcome ministry. The church is devoted to serving Chinese and East Asian communities in the U.S., with a special heart for newcomers settling into a new land.
paragraphs.mission: His desire is to walk with people from landing to rooting, so they may experience God's grace and renewed life in Christ.

focusItems.care: Pastoral care and visitation, and developing co-workers
focusItems.outreach: Community outreach and practical care, including street outreach, winter coat drives, and new immigrant settling support (housing, school enrollment, driver's license guidance, language exchange)

AboutPage.title: People & Stories
AboutPage.subtitle: Faith journeys and everyday service in our church family.
AboutPage.peopleSubtitle: Four brothers who faithfully join church life and serve together.

jin.name: 金鑫全｜Xinquan Jin
jin.cnBio: 金鑫全弟兄在 Dynamic Gospel Church / Dynamic Gospel Church 稳定参加主日敬拜、查经与祷告，并积极融入纽约 Woodside 与加州 Irvine 的教会大家庭。他乐意在教会活动中配搭同工、参与接待与关怀，也愿意陪伴新朋友熟悉教会生活。盼望在这“家外之家”里，与众弟兄姊妹一同经历主的带领，从落地到扎根。
jin.enBio: Xinquan Jin faithfully joins Sunday worship, Bible study, and prayer gatherings at Dynamic Gospel/Gospel Church, connecting with the church family in Woodside, NY and Irvine, CA. He is glad to serve during church events through hospitality and practical support, and he enjoys welcoming newcomers so they can feel at home. His desire is to grow together as a “Home Away From Home,” experiencing God’s guidance from landing to rooting.
jin.testimony: In the midst of pressure, the Lord gives me rest—and teaches me to welcome others with gentleness.

li.name: 李庭明｜Tingming Li
li.cnBio: 李庭明弟兄持续参与教会主日敬拜与小组团契，重视灵修操练与彼此代祷，也愿意在活动中支持教会的组织与协调工作。他珍惜教会中真实的陪伴与属灵遮盖，常用耐心与倾听关心身边的弟兄姊妹。愿教会成为更多人的属灵港湾，在“家外之家”里同走天路，从落地到扎根。
li.enBio: Tingming Li regularly participates in Sunday worship and small-group fellowship, valuing spiritual growth and prayer. He is also willing to support church events through coordination and practical help. Li treasures the genuine community and spiritual covering found in the church, often caring for others with patience and a listening heart. He hopes the church can be a spiritual harbor—a “Home Away From Home”—where many can journey together from landing to rooting.
li.testimony: When I stopped relying only on myself, the Lord began to make the path clear—step by step.

liuXin.name: 刘鑫｜Xin Liu
liuXin.cnBio: 刘鑫弟兄积极参与教会团契生活与各类活动，乐意与弟兄姊妹分享近况、交流信仰与生活见证。在聚会中，他重视真理扎根与彼此建造，也愿意配搭同工参与接待、沟通与现场支持。盼望通过教会的爱与真理，帮助更多新朋友融入群体，在“家外之家”里被坚固、被更新，从落地到扎根。
liuXin.enBio: Xin Liu actively engages in fellowship and church activities, enjoying sharing life updates and faith reflections with brothers and sisters. He values being grounded in God’s Word while building one another up through community. Liu is also glad to co-serve during events—helping with hospitality, communication, and on-site support. He hopes more newcomers can find strength and renewal in this “Home Away From Home,” growing from landing to rooting.
liuXin.testimony: The Lord is my Shepherd—my security no longer depends on circumstances.

liuGuidong.name: 刘桂东｜Guidong Liu
liuGuidong.cnBio: 刘桂东弟兄稳定参与主日敬拜、查经与祷告，并关心教会对社区与新移民的关怀事工。他愿意以实际行动参与活动支持、志愿服事与外展配搭，在点滴细节中见证基督的爱。他相信教会不只是聚会地点，更是属灵家庭与避风港；愿在纽约 Woodside 与加州 Irvine 的弟兄姊妹同行中，一同被主带领，从落地到扎根。
liuGuidong.enBio: Guidong Liu consistently attends Sunday worship, Bible study, and prayer, with a heart for caring ministry toward the community and newcomers. He is willing to serve through volunteering, event support, and outreach partnership, reflecting Christ’s love through practical actions. He believes the church is more than a meeting place—it is a spiritual family and a safe harbor. He looks forward to walking with believers in Woodside, NY and Irvine, CA, growing from landing to rooting.
liuGuidong.testimony: Faith isn’t a slogan—it’s choosing to walk humbly, love mercy, and do what’s right each day.

BaptismCertificate.title: Certificate of Baptism
BaptismCertificate.subtitle: A milestone of faith and new life in Christ.

outreach.title: Community Outreach & Relief
outreach.subtitle: Community Outreach
outreach.tagline: Love in Flushing, warmth in every heart
outreach.description: Based on Roosevelt Avenue in Flushing, New York, we serve unhoused neighbors and families in need with hot meals and winter clothing.

street.name: Street Outreach
street.detail: Weekly on Roosevelt Avenue in Flushing, we distribute hot meals, bread, and water to unhoused and low-income neighbors.

winter.name: Winter Coat Drive
winter.detail: As winter approaches, we collect and distribute coats and cold-weather clothing so no neighbor has to shiver in the cold.

immigrant.title: New Immigrant Settling Support
immigrant.subtitle: New Immigrant Services
immigrant.tagline: From landing to rooting, we walk with you
immigrant.description: Newly arrived? Don't worry. We offer help where we can.

lifeGuide.name: Everyday Life Guide
lifeGuide.detail: Help with housing, school enrollment, driver's license, and other practical needs.

language.name: Language Exchange Group
language.detail: Build English skills through Bible reading and fellowship.

support.name: Legal & Emotional Support
support.detail: For brothers and sisters facing legal challenges (such as immigration cases), we provide character references and spiritual care.

growth.title: Spiritual Growth
growth.subtitle: Spiritual Growth
growth.description: Whether you're a devoted believer or simply exploring faith, you are welcome to discover life's meaning.

sunday.name: Sunday Service
sunday.detail: Weekly worship with praise and message.

bibleStudy.name: Bible Study & Fellowship
bibleStudy.detail: Dive into Scripture and build lasting friendships.

ca.name: California Campus
ca.time: West Coast home fellowship and new immigrant welcome
ca.phone: Contact the New York campus for details

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: Stories of Hope
Testimonials.quote: When I first arrived in New York, I had no one. A brother from the church handed me a hot meal at the subway station, and I felt warmth I hadn't known in a long time. Now I wear the volunteer vest too, helping others like me.

Footer.description: Home away from home. We serve Chinese and East Asian communities in the U.S., warming every wandering soul with the love of Christ.
